Say congratulations to Jamya Kirby, Jaythan Grant, Manuel Lopez and Jazzlynn Bender for participating in TECH 2018! This took place in the rotunda of the state capital building in Springfield on Thursday, May 10. It was a showcase of technology in Illinois schools and a chance to meet with our state legislators to encourage continued funding for educational technology.
All of our students represented Pembroke School District well and I dare say we had one of the most popular displays!
Thanks to all administrators teachers/coaches, students, and parents for a successful event.
